question: Which section of RBI is not correctly matched?
option1: Section 26 - describes the legal tender character of Indian bank notes.
option2: Section 18 - manner in which RBI can conduct business
answer: Section 18 - manner in which RBI can conduct business
explanation: Section 18 of the RBI Act deals with emergency loans to banks and Section 17 of the Act defines the manner in which the RBI can conduct business.
